p: The Enrichment Analysis also revealed downregulated protein-coding genes related to histone 1 and 2 cluster, ubiquitin, cyclin, E2F Transcription Factor 2 (Fig. 3c, Supplemental Table 2). The downregulation of FBXO43, CKS2, AURKA, CCNB1, CDC20, UBE2C, CCNF, and CCNA2 genes could also contribute to the decreasing of cell growth (Fig. 2, Supplemental Tables 1 and 2) corroborating the reduction of cell proliferation in vitro. Moreover, we found downregulated genes (CCNB1, AURKA, PMAIP, and PLK3), which are also associated with the response to DNA damage.
